# Core Python Web Framework
fastapi

# ASGI Server: Required to run the FastAPI application
# [standard] includes dependencies like 'websockets' and 'python-multipart'
uvicorn[standard]

# CLI Framework (Typer is built on Click)
# You need this to build your executable sample code
typer

# Optional: If you want to use Pydantic V2 features explicitly
pydantic>=2.0

# Optional: Testing and Quality Assurance Tools
# Essential for CI/CD pipeline (Step 2: Python Setup & Run Code Tests)
pytest
